name: I Hate Cubes
description:
I Hate Cubes is a game where you wander and explore a greatly crafted platform defending yourself from maddening cubes and killing them.

You go on a journey to a mystical world of cubes unaware of the information that in the world of cubes people of other species are not tolerated and are immediately persecuted. Hopefully, you have a gun with you. 

So just Shoot those Cubes and escape.

FEATURES

  • Immersive gameplay full of different power packed levels.
  • Properly crafted levels giving you the feeling of FPS-platformer.
  • Experience the beauty of different levels.
  • Amazing color contrast.
  • Lag free gameplay.
  • First Person Shooting game.
  • 3-D Platformer.
  • There are no limits, no missions, you have to just enjoy exploring the stages and killing the cubes.
  • All the stages are unlocked for you to try.

INSTRUCTIONS

  • You can go to the game menu by clicking "M" on your keyboard
  • To disable full screen in game, first go to menu and then click on options and then toggle off the full screen button.
